questions.question: Hi
questions.answer: Hey there! Glad you contacted. Feel free to ask your queries.

questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hey there! Glad you contacted. Feel free to ask your queries.

questions.question: How are you?
questions.answer: I am good. How can I assist you today?

questions.question: What is the purpose of the chatbot?
questions.answer: The chatbot is designed to assist users with inquiries related to the Bachelor of Computer Application at Graphic Era Hill University.

questions.question: How can I check my result?
questions.answer:
Step 1: Log in to the ERP: https://student.gehu.ac.in
Step 2: Click on the Exam button.
Step 3: Click on Result button.
Step 4: Select the semester.
Step 5: Now you can download the PDF.
Thanks for visiting!

questions.question: How can I log in to ERP?
questions.answer: You can log in to the ERP system by visiting https://student.gehu.ac.in.

questions.question: Tell me about the department website.
questions.answer: The department website can be found at https://dehradun.gehu.ac.in/course/bca/.

questions.question: How to contact the department?
questions.answer: You can contact the department by reaching out to the provided contact information on the official website or through designated communication channels.

questions.question: Thank you
questions.answer: Your welcome :) and have a nice day!

questions.question: How to deposit my fee online?
questions.answer:
Step 1: Log in to the ERP: https://student.gehu.ac.in
Step 2: Click on the fee button.
Step 3: Click on Fee Submission button.
Step 4: Select the payment mode and gateway and enter the captcha.
Step 5: Proceed to make the transaction successfully according to the mode of payment.
Thanks for visiting!

dataset.hi: Hello how may I help you
dataset.hello: Glad you reached out! Feel free to ask your queries
